name: Bullet Train!
description:
"Bullet Train! - Pixel Game Maker Awards: Round 3"

A sudden apocalyptic event has the denizens of planet E'skargoh in a rush to get their money off-world via space train. However a group of rowdy hooligans see an opportunity for a big time payout... Let the greatest train heist in the galaxy begin!

~Made in two weeks for the PGMA competition~

-theme: Trains-

"How to Play/Controls" (included in game)

Movement: W A S D -

Take cover: W - Protects from most damage. (explosions being the exception.)

Slide: S or Spacebar: Allows player to dash through damage.

Mouse: Aim + Click to shoot. (shooting enemies kills them strangely enough... crazy.)

(space to proceed through dialogue)
